infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: FastTrack uses your location to measure vehicle speed and distance for acceleration timing.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: FastTrack uses your location to measure vehicle speed and distance for acceleration timing.
infoPlist.NSMotionUsageDescription: FastTrack uses motion sensors to enhance speed measurement accuracy.
infoPlist.NSContactsUsageDescription: FastTrack uses your contacts to help you find and connect with friends who also use the app.

plugins.contactsPermission: FastTrack uses your contacts to help you find and connect with friends who also use the app.
